entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
